verbose_text: In addition, multiple reports have shown that maximal in vitro microglial and astrocyte responses to HSV-1 are dependent on the presence of TLR2 and HSV-1-infected microglia derived from TLR2 deficient mice have been demonstrated to elicit less neuronal oxidative damage and death in mixed neural cell cultures in comparison to infected wild-type microglia.
evidence: TLR2 deficient mice have been demonstrated to elicit less neuronal oxidative damage and death
